tip1: Always keep your documents with you at the airport.
tip2: Do not take items from strangers.
securityIntro: Follow simple security rules in the airplane and airport.
name: Name
mainTitle: Qazaq Air Data Center Security System
mainSubtitle: This system is designed to ensure the information security of the Qazaq Air airline data center. Here you can learn about security rules, track events, and register incidents.
securityDesc: Learn about security rules at the airport and on board.
qualityDesc: High standards of service and safety.
tips: Arrive at the airport early to pass all checks on time.
Prepare your documents and tickets in advance.
Do not take items from strangers and do not give your belongings to others.
If you notice suspicious actions or items, immediately inform the security service.
Do not leave personal belongings unattended.
Follow the instructions of security staff.

faq.q: What happens if I break the security rules?
faq.a: Violation of the rules may result in administrative measures at the airport or on board, up to removal from the flight.

faq.q: What should I do if I notice suspicious activity?
faq.a: Immediately contact airport or security staff.

faq.q: What items are not allowed on the plane?
faq.a: It is forbidden to carry explosives, flammable, sharp and dangerous items. See the full list on the airport website.

contactSubtitle: Leave us your question or suggestion. We will definitely respond.
messageSent: Your message has been sent successfully!
pleaseLoginOrRegister: Please login or register to view your profile.
